name: Ext_R5_Measure_gr_po_aggregateMethod
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Measure.group.population.aggregateMethod for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Measure.group.population.aggregateMethod from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Measure|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Aggregation method for a measure score (e.g. sum, average, median, minimum, maximum, count)
element.definition: Specifies which method should be used to aggregate measure observation values. For most scoring types, this is implied by scoring (e.g. a proportion measure counts members of the populations). For continuous variables, however, this information must be specified to ensure correct calculation.
element.comment: `Measure.group.population.aggregateMethod` has no related element in R4B:Measure
